```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
run_ep_method1_cutoff_setting3_simulation <- function(a_vec = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10), 
                                               alpha = .05,
                                               cutoff = .2,
                                               num_iter = 500){
result_vec_power <- c()
result_vec_fdr <- c()
for (amp in a_vec){
  result <- run_ep_method1_cutoff_simulation(n = 1000,
                                          d = 100,
                                          a = amp, 
                                          num_true_sigs = 20,
                                          alpha = alpha,
                                          cutoff = cutoff,
                                          num_iter = num_iter)
  result_vec_power <- c(result_vec_power, result$power)
  result_vec_fdr <- c(result_vec_fdr, result$fdr)
}
return(data.frame(a = a_vec, power = result_vec_power, fdr = result_vec_fdr))
}
```

